title: Trace viewer - agent-native (tool calls, reasoning)
description: Build an agent-native trace viewer that displays tool calls, reasoning steps, and execution flow. This is different from traditional APM traces - it should highlight agent-specific concepts like tool invocations, LLM reasoning, and decision points.
acceptance_criteria: Trace detail page shows hierarchical view of spans
Tool calls displayed with input/output and duration
LLM reasoning steps shown with model, tokens, latency
Color coding by span type (llm, tool, agent)
Copy-to-clipboard for trace ID and payloads
